/* selectQnaList */
SELECT A.QNA_ID , FN_GET_CODENM(a.QNA_TYPE) AS QNA_TYPE , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_CONTENTS , A.QNA_ANSWER , date_format(A.ANSWER_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as ANSWER_DTTM , FN_USER_KEY_INFO(A.ANSWER_ID, 'NM') AS ANSWER_ID , date_format(A.CREATE_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') as CREATE_DTTM , FN_USER_KEY_INFO(A.CREATE_ID, 'NM') AS CREATE_ID , A.MODIFY_DTTM , A.MODIFY_ID FROM PTL_QNA A , (SELECT @rownum:= #{rownum, jdbcType=INTEGER}) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.QNA_TITLE like concat('%',#{searchword},'%')
AND (A.QNA_ANSWER IS NULL AND A.ANSWER_DTTM IS NULL)
AND A.QNA_ANSWER IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.QNA_ID DESC

SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM PTL_QNA WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND QNA_TITLE like concat('%',#{searchword},'%')
AND (QNA_ANSWER IS NULL AND ANSWER_DTTM IS NULL)
AND QNA_ANSWER IS NOT NULL

SELECT a.qna_id , FN_GET_CODENM(a.qna_type) AS qna_type , a.qna_TITLE , a.qna_contents , a.atch_link_id , a.qna_answer , date_format(a.answer_dttm,'%Y-%m-%d') AS answer_dttm , date_format(a.create_dttm,'%Y-%m-%d') AS create_dttm , date_format(a.modify_dttm,'%Y-%m-%d') AS modify_dttm , a.answer_id , a.create_id , a.modify_id FROM PTL_QNA a WHERE 1=1 AND a.DEL_YN = 'N' AND a.qna_id = #{qna_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
